output_list.description: The _transfer function does not check for integer overflow when adding or subtracting balances, which could lead to incorrect results and potentially loss of funds.
The onlyOwner modifier is not used in the mintToken and setPrices functions, allowing anyone to mint tokens or set prices without authorization.
The buy and sell functions do not check if the contract has enough balance to perform the transaction, which could lead to a revert and loss of funds.
The buy and sell functions do not check if the contract has enough Ether to perform the transaction, which could lead to a revert and loss of funds.
The buy and sell functions do not check if the contract has enough Ether to perform the transaction, which could lead to a revert and loss of funds.
